body:
Comment 6: 
Alex,
Thank you very much for the direction.  I used your instructions, along with the wingui
project to create an interface layer to ODBC using entirely syscall and no cgo.  It was
a difficult but rewarding experience and I learned alot.  Once I get the chance to
verify my code a bit more, I plan on posting it to go-lang nuts for a peer review to get
feedback from others.
